original_text: And the king said to them, “Take with you the servants of your lord and have Solomon my son ride on my own mule, and bring him down to Gihon.
korean_text: 왕이 그들에게 이르되 너희는 너희 주의 신하들을 데리고 내 아들 솔로몬을 내 노새에 태우고 기혼으로 인도하여 내려가고

sentences.original_text: And the king said to them,
Take with you the servants of your lord
and have Solomon my son ride on my own mule,
sentences.korean_translation: 내 아들 솔로몬을 나의 노새에 태우고

sentences.original_text: and bring him down to Gihon.
